title: Welcome to the New Updates Page!
body: This page now helps you keep your extension up-to-date by checking for the latest releases directly from our GitHub repository. We've also added this notification system for important announcements.

title: About Notifications
body:
We may occasionally send important announcements or tips via this notification system. Click the bell icon to see new messages. Click on a message title to read the full details.

Notifications are cached locally for faster loading.

title: Tip: Manual Installation
body: If you download a .zip or .crx file, you might need to manually install it. Go to chrome://extensions, enable Developer mode, and drag the downloaded file onto the page.

title: Pre-release v2.3.81-pre Now Available for Download!
body: A new pre-release (v2.3.81-pre) of modcore Extension Manager is now available on GitHub. This version is for previewing upcoming features and gathering feedback; it's not yet ready for production use. Download it here: https://github.com/modcoretech/modcore-extension-manager/releases/tag/v2.3.81-pre

title: Add-on Store Will Be Removed in v2.3.81
body: The Add-on Store will no longer be included in NG Extension Manager starting with version 2.3.81. While you can still download add-ons manually from our GitHub repository, they will no longer integrate into NGEM. Older versions may still display the store, but functionality is not guaranteed. Learn more: https://shorturl.at/sF5qX
